# Subset

```{r}
df2 <- df %>%
  dplyr::select(gender, 
         age, 
         main_pain_location, 
         pain_extent,
         profession_status, 
         educational_level, 
         comorbidity,
         gcps_total_baseline,
         expect_final_score,
         lot_r_final_score,
         cpaq_final_score,
         gcps_total_1year_follow_up) 

names(df2) <- c("gender",
                "age",
                "pain_loc",
                "pain_ext",
                "work",
                "education",
                "comorbidity",
                "gcps",
                "expect",
                "lot",
                "cpaq",
                "gcps_t1")

df2 <- df2%>%
  mutate (pain_loc = case_when(
    
    pain_loc %in% c(2, 7, 8, 9) ~ "UL",
    pain_loc %in% c(3, 4, 5) ~ "LL",
    pain_loc == 0 ~ "Lx",
    pain_loc == 1 ~ "Cx",
    TRUE ~ "FM"
  )) %>%
  mutate_at (c("gender", "pain_loc", "pain_ext", 
               "work", "education", "comorbidity"), factor)
skimr::skim (df2)
```

# Impute

```{r}
# imp <- mice::mice(df2, m = 20, seed = 155, maxit = 30, meth = "rf")
# 
# saveRDS(imp, "output/imp.RDS")
imp <- readRDS("output/imp.RDS")

set.seed(123)
rand_n <- sample (1:20, 1)

df3 <- mice::complete (imp, rand_n)

pred_num <- c("age", "gcps", "expect", "lot", "cpaq")

df3 <-  df3 %>%
  mutate_at(vars (pred_num), ~scale(.x, center = TRUE, scale = FALSE) %>%as.numeric) 
skimr::skim (df3)
```

```{r}
ggplot (df3) +
  geom_point(aes (x = cpaq, y = gcps_t1))
```


# MARS

```{r}
# create a tuning grid
hyper_grid <- expand.grid(
  degree = 1:2, 
  nprune = seq(2, 20, length.out = 10)
)


set.seed(123)  # for reproducibility
cv_mars <- train(
  x = df3 %>% dplyr::select (-gcps_t1),
  y = as.numeric (df3$gcps_t1),
  method = "earth",
  linpreds=FALSE,
  metric = "RMSE",
  trControl = trainControl(method = "cv", number = 10),
  tuneGrid = hyper_grid
)

cv_mars$bestTune
ggplot(cv_mars)

m2 <- earth (gcps_t1 ~ .,
                data = df3,
                degree = 1,
                nprune = 6,
                linpreds=FALSE)

summary (m2)

```

# mboost

```{r}
library("iboost")
library("mboost")

df4 <- df3 %>%
  mutate_at(vars (age, gcps, expect, lot, cpaq), scale, center = TRUE, scale = FALSE)

f1 <- gcps_t1 ~ 
  bols(gender)  + 
  bols(age)  + 
  bols(pain_loc)  + 
  bols(pain_ext)  + 
  bols(work)  + 
  bols(comorbidity)  + 
  bols(gcps)  + 
  bols(expect)  + 
  bols(lot)  + 
  bols(cpaq)  + 
  bbs(age)  + 
  bbs(gcps)  + 
  bbs(expect)  + 
  bbs(lot)  + 
  bbs(cpaq) 
  
m1 <- gamboost (f1, data = df4)
cvm <- cvrisk(m1)
plot(cvm)
m1[mstop(cvm)]


```
